page.title: 09Employment Gipsey BRidge
page.content: While half of the people in our area work in the county the other half travel into the town for employment,it is too far to go into a city.The majority of these people like their work but a few find it boring. Very few peoples work has yet been affected by the use of computers and continues to be mainly manual with the aid of special machinery. Most families have somebody unemployed,the women go out to work in their families.Some of the people go out to work in the night as well as the day,but most of the women only work in the day.A lot of people use their hands in their work all the year round.Most farmworkers in this area use special machinery and are not on piece work although some were before they changed jobs.A lot of peoples work is in the immediate area.
